content.body: I wonder if `dispatchSnapshot` as a property of events would be clear to developers who have no clue what AsyncContext even is or what it's meant for
content.formatted_body: I wonder if dispatchSnapshot as a property of events would be clear to developers who have no clue what AsyncContext even is or what it's meant for

content.body: well, I guess we don't need it to be clear, we just need them not to use it
* well, I guess we don't need it to be clear, we just need them not to use it by mistake

m.new_content.body: well, I guess we don't need it to be clear, we just need them not to use it by mistake
